controllers
Class Mapper

java.lang.Object
  play.mvc.Controller
      controllers.Mapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
play.classloading.enhancers.ControllersEnhancer.ControllerSupport, play.classloading.enhancers.LocalvariablesNamesEnhancer.LocalVariablesSupport
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin
public class Mapper
extends play.mvc.Controller

This is a place for a lot of functions and DB maintenance things that don't belong anywhere else. It was originally used as a place for functions that connect multiple entities, but it also contains functions for things like generating deployment plans &c.

Author:
mattwigway

Mapper

public Mapper()
Method Detail

mapFeedsToAgenciesByUrl

public static void mapFeedsToAgenciesByUrl()
Attempt to automatch feeds to agencies by URL.

mapFeedsWithNoAgencies

public static void mapFeedsWithNoAgencies()
Create NTD agencies and assign them to metro areas for all unmapped feeds. Since many agencies do not have NTD entries, this fills out the database.

clearAllAgencyFeedMappings

public static void clearAllAgencyFeedMappings()
Clear ALL agency to feed mappings. This should be protected

mapAgenciesToMetroAreasSpatially

public static void mapAgenciesToMetroAreasSpatially()
Attempt to spatially assign metro areas to agencies

clearAllAgencyMetroAreaMappings

public static void clearAllAgencyMetroAreaMappings()
DANGER: clear all agency to metro area mappings

moveFeedsRemoveAgency

public static void moveFeedsRemoveAgency(long from,
                                         long to)
Delete the agency specified by from, moving all of its feeds to the agency specified by to.

removeMetroAreasWithNoAgencies

public static void removeMetroAreasWithNoAgencies()
Delete all metro areas that have no agencies

autoNameMetroAreas

public static void autoNameMetroAreas()
Name metro areas based on area description of largest agency by ridership

connectFeedsAndAgencies

public static void connectFeedsAndAgencies(long[] feed,
                                           long[] agency)
Manually map feeds to agencies. This will connect each feed specified with each agency specified. All feeds specified will be connected to all agencies specified.

Parameters:
feed - The feeds to map
agency - The agencies to map

setGoogleGtfsFromParse

public static void setGoogleGtfsFromParse(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String areaName,
                                          double lat,
                                          double lon)
Make a best-guess for what agency is referenced by a name based on its location and name.

public static void fetchGtfs()

createGtfsBundles

public static void createGtfsBundles(MetroArea metroArea)
Create GTFS bundle entries for the given metro area ID.

calculateFeedStats

public static void calculateFeedStats(java.lang.String storedId)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Retrieve the GTFS with the given ID in storage and calculate its feed stats, displaying them to the user. It uses a stored ID not a GtfsFeed ID so the user can diagnose stats on feeds that downloaded successfully but crashed during feed stats calculation.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

mapAgenciesByUzaAndMerge

public static void mapAgenciesByUzaAndMerge(boolean commit)
Assign agencies to metro areas by their UZA and then merge connected UZAs.

Parameters:
commit - If set to false, this transaction will not be committed. Useful for doing a dry run since this mapper is pretty destructive.

createDeletedMetroAreas

public static void createDeletedMetroAreas()
This function is for a very specific circumstance: when the user has accidentally deleted the UnmatchedMetroAreas, this will recreate them based on the UnmatchedPrivateGtfsFeeds.

recalculateFeedStats

public static void recalculateFeedStats()
This reads all files back from storage and runs stats on them.
